FILETIME=[D35D4A30:01C71882] 

MIME element (text/plain)
NetResult Internal Reference:  FAPL_NRID12837 
 
Please quote the above FAPL_NRID12837 reference in all communications
with us regarding this issue. 
 
We write on behalf of The FA Premier League, in respect of certain
intellectual property rights including football Club Crests. 
 
We have noticed that your website, http://www.sportingaffair.co.uk/  is
displaying The FA Premier Leagues clubs crests. 
 
We wish to make you aware that we have a good faith belief that your
present use is an infringement of the The FA Premier League's legal
rights and that all such unauthorised use must cease immediately. Please
confirm by return your agreement to this and give your undertaking to
cease all such infringements on any and all of your web sites. Pending
your response the FA Premier League's rights are fully reserved. 
 
We thank you for your cooperation. 
 
Yours sincerely, 
           Sebastian Taylor 
 
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA 
 
Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB

 
Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action. 
 
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------
NetResult - World Leaders in Online Intellectual Property Management
